actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 96-1427.

official_title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against H.R. 7854, making appropriations for Foreign Assistance and related programs for the fiscal year ending Sept. 30, 1981, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Waives certain points of order against H.R. 7854 (foreign aid).

titles.title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against H.R. 7854, making appropriations for Foreign Assistance and related programs for the fiscal year ending Sept. 30, 1981, and for other purposes.
